title: Calendar day calculation
name: LGF_GetCalendarDay
description: This function uses the specified date to calculate the number of days that have passed since the beginning of the year (1st January).

input.name: date
input.description: Date for the calculation of the calendar days since 1 January.

output.name: error
output.description: FALSE: No error / TRUE: An error occurred during the execution of the FB

output.name: status
output.description: 16#0000-16#7FFF: Status of the FB / 16#8000-16#FFFF: Error identification

status_codes.16#8201: ERR_LIM_DATE Date out of the range

description_zh: 一个函数FC，根据指定的日期计算从当年1月1日起已经过去的日历天数。该函数接受一个DTL类型的日期输入，并返回一个DInt类型的值，表示从1月1日到输入日期的天数差。如果输入日期超出有效范围，函数将返回一个错误状态。
